data.summary:
JupyterLab: XSS due to lack of sanitization of the action attribute of an html <form> ### Impact

Untrusted notebook can execute code on load. This is a remote code execution, but requires user action to open a notebook.

### Patches

Patched in the following versions: 3.1.4, 3.0.17, 2.3.2, 2.2.10, 1.2.21.

### References

[OWASP Page on Restricting Form Submissions](https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Content_Security_Policy_Cheat_Sheet.html)

### For more information

If you have any questions or comments about this advisory, or vulnerabilities to report, please email our security list security@ipython.org.

Credit: Guillaume Jeanne from Google
data.message:
Merge pull request from GHSA-4952-p58q-6crx

Remove `form` tags' `action` attribute during sanitizing.

Co-authored-by: Afshin Taylor Darian <git@darian.af>
data.author: Steven Silvester

From 504825938c0abfa2fb8ff8d529308830a5ae42ed Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
From: Steven Silvester <ssilvester@apple.com>
Date: Thu, 5 Aug 2021 11:42:03 -0500
Subject: [PATCH] Merge pull request from GHSA-4952-p58q-6crx

Remove `form` tags' `action` attribute during sanitizing.

Co-authored-by: Afshin Taylor Darian <git@darian.af>
---
 packages/apputils/src/sanitizer.ts | 1 -
 1 file changed, 1 deletion(-)

index b281cc4172d6..897f215229f0 100644
--- a/packages/apputils/src/sanitizer.ts
+++ b/packages/apputils/src/sanitizer.ts
@@ -624,7 +624,6 @@ export class Sanitizer implements ISanitizer {
       font: ['color', 'face', 'size'],
       form: [
         'accept',
-        'action',
         'autocomplete',
         'enctype',
         'method',
